00027 bool transformCoords( isis::util::PropertyMap &properties, util::vector4<size_t> size, boost::numeric::ublas::matrix<float> transform, bool transformCenterIsImageCenter  )
00028 {
00029     if( !properties.hasProperty( "rowVec" ) || !properties.hasProperty( "columnVec" ) || !properties.hasProperty( "sliceVec" )
00030         || !properties.hasProperty( "voxelSize" ) || !properties.hasProperty( "indexOrigin" ) ) {
00031         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Missing one of the properties (rowVec, columnVec, sliceVec, voxelSize, indexOrigin)";
00032         return false;
00033     }
00034 
00035     using namespace boost::numeric::ublas;
00036     // this implementation assumes that the PropMap properties is either a
00037     // data::Chunk or a data::Image object. Hence it should contain the
00038     // properties rowVec, columnVec, sliceVec and indexOrigin.
00039     // get row, column and slice vector from property map
00040     isis::util::fvector4 row = properties.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "rowVec" );
00041     isis::util::fvector4 column = properties.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "columnVec" );
00042     isis::util::fvector4 slice = properties.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "sliceVec" );
00043     // get index origin from property map
00044     isis::util::fvector4 indexorig = properties.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" );
00045     vector<float> origin_out = vector<float>( 3 );
00046     //check if we have a property "voxelGap" to prevent isis from throwing a warning "blabla"
00047     isis::util::fvector4 scaling;
00048 
00049     if( properties.hasProperty( "voxelGap" ) ) {
00050         scaling  = properties.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "voxelSize" ) +  properties.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "voxelGap" );
00051     } else {
00052         scaling  = properties.getPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "voxelSize" );
00053     }
00054 
00055     // create boost::numeric data structures
00056     // STEP 1 transform orientation matrix
00057     // input matrix
00058     matrix<float> R_in( 3, 3 );
00059 
00060     for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
00061         R_in( i, 0 ) = row[i];
00062         R_in( i, 1 ) = column[i];
00063         R_in( i, 2 ) = slice[i];
00064     }
00065 
00066     matrix<float> R_out( 3, 3 );
00067 
00068     if( transformCenterIsImageCenter ) {
00069         R_out = prod( R_in, transform );
00070     } else {
00071         R_out = prod( transform, R_in );
00072     }
00073 
00074     for ( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
00075         row[i] = R_out( i, 0 );
00076         column[i] = R_out( i, 1 );
00077         slice[i] = R_out( i, 2 );
00078     }
00079 
00080     vector<float> origin_in( 3 );
00081 
00082     for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
00083         origin_in( i ) = indexorig[i];
00084     }
00085 
00086     //the center of the transformation is the image center (eg. spm transformation)
00087     if( transformCenterIsImageCenter ) {
00088         matrix<float> R_in_inverse( R_in );
00089 
00090         if( !_internal::inverseMatrix<float>( R_in, R_in_inverse ) ) {
00091             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Can not inverse orientation matrix: " << R_in;
00092             return false;
00093         }
00094 
00095         //we have to map the indexes of the image size into the scanner space
00096 
00097         vector<float> physicalSize( 3 );
00098         vector<float> boostScaling( 3 );
00099 
00100         for ( unsigned short i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
00101             physicalSize( i ) = size[i] * scaling[i];
00102             boostScaling( i ) = scaling[i];
00103         }
00104 
00105         // now we have to calculate the center of the image in physical space
00106         vector<float> half_image( 3 );
00107 
00108         for ( unsigned short i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
00109             half_image( i ) = ( physicalSize( i )  - boostScaling( i ) ) * 0.5;
00110         }
00111 
00112         vector<float> center_image = prod( R_in, half_image ) + origin_in ;
00113         //now translate this center to the center of the physical space and get the new image origin
00114         vector<float> io_translated = origin_in - center_image;
00115         //now multiply this translated origin with the inverse of the orientation matrix of the image
00116         vector<float> io_ortho = prod( R_in_inverse, io_translated );
00117         //now transform this matrix with the actual transformation matrix
00118         vector<float> transformed_io_ortho = prod( io_ortho, transform );
00119         //now transform ths point back with the orientation matrix of the image
00120         vector<float> transformed_io = prod( R_in, transformed_io_ortho );
00121         //and finally we have to retranslate this origin to get the image to our old position in physical space
00122         origin_out = transformed_io + center_image;
00123 
00124     } else {
00125         origin_out = prod( transform, origin_in );
00126     }
00127 
00128     for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
00129         indexorig[i] = origin_out( i );
00130     }
00131 
00132     // write modified values back into property map
00133     properties.setPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin", indexorig );
00134     properties.setPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "rowVec", row );
00135     properties.setPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "columnVec", column );
00136     properties.setPropertyAs<util::fvector4>( "sliceVec", slice );
00137     return true;
00138 }
00139 
00140 }
00141 
00142 boost::filesystem::path getCommonSource( std::list<boost::filesystem::path> sources )
00143 {
00144     sources.erase( std::unique( sources.begin(), sources.end() ), sources.end() );
00145 
00146     if( sources.empty() ) {
00147         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Failed to get common source";
00148         return boost::filesystem::path();
00149     } else if( sources.size() == 1 )
00150         return sources.front();
00151     else {
00152         BOOST_FOREACH( boost::filesystem::path & ref, sources )
00153         ref.remove_filename();
00154         return getCommonSource( sources );
00155     }
00156 }
00157 boost::filesystem::path getCommonSource( const std::list<data::Image> &imgs )
00158 {
00159     std::list<boost::filesystem::path> sources;
00160     BOOST_FOREACH( const data::Image & img, imgs ) {
00161         if( img.hasProperty( "source" ) )
00162             sources.push_back( img.getPropertyAs<std::string>( "source" ) );
00163         else {
00164             BOOST_FOREACH( const util::PropertyValue & ref, img.getChunksProperties( "source", true ) ) {
00165                 sources.push_back( ref.as<std::string>() );
00166             }
00167         }
00168     }
00169     sources.sort();
00170     return getCommonSource( sources );
00171 }
00172 boost::filesystem::path getCommonSource( const data::Image &img )
00173 {
00174     return getCommonSource( std::list<data::Image>( 1, img ) );
00175 }
00176 
00177 }
